thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Unicredit CEO says mergers risk delaying a bank's transformation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unicredit CEO says mergers risk delaying a bank's transformation
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - UniCredit CEO Jean Pierre Mustier tells Reuters Breakingviews event:
* Benefits of consolidation and bigger scale in a merger need to outweigh the fact that integration delays the transformation of banks
* When you merge, you spend more time integrating rather than transforming, risk going back versus your competitors
* Reiterates Unicreditâ€™s business plan based on organic growth Further company coverage: (Reporting by Milan Newsroom; Editing by Elaine Hardcastle)
